name: Tropical Islands (working title)
description:
In this update of my rpg you are able to test the sailing and cooking mechanics!

Tropical Islands is the sort of rpg, where you can go do what you want. Sail trough a small, immersive world, explore dungeons, trade merchandise and make a hearty meal over a campfire at the end of the day.

Currently in early and active development. Devlogs can be found on youtube and if you like to support the development long term, we even got a patreon. Thanks for reading and have fun.

https://www.youtube.com/@byteslider
https://www.patreon.com/byteslider
